description.p: Options for defining the underline style for an Office::Font object.

item.name: *[xb:Office::Underline::Single]*
item.description: Value = 1. Single underline, only under the text.

item.name: *[xb:Office::Underline::Double]*
item.description: Value = 2. Double underline, only under the text.

item.name: *[xb:Office::Underline::SingleAcc]*
item.description: Value = 33. Single underline, fills the cell width.

item.name: *[xb:Office::Underline::DoubleAcc]*
item.description: Value = 34. Double underline, fills the cell width.
